About

Welcome! Francis here. I'm a concert-chasing, coffee-obsessed, life-loving person just trying to make cool things and revolutionize education. Always down and trying to explore, adventure and experience. Senior | Informatics 2015 | UW | UX/UI/Industrial Design | Web Development
